text: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

translation.en.sahih: But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers.
translation.id.indonesian: (Bukan demikian) sebenarya telah datang keterangan-keterangan-Ku kepadamu lalu kamu mendustakannya dan kamu menyombongkan diri dan adalah kamu termasuk orang-orang yang kafir".
